Package org.eclipse.imagen.media.piecewise

Interface MathTransformation

All Known Implementing Classes:
SingleDimensionTransformation, SingleDimensionTransformation.ConstantTransform
public interface MathTransformation
Interface used for implementing a new Mathematic transformation.
Author:
Nicola Lagomarsini geosolutions
